participant_1.background:
My mother is a librarian.
The only autographs i have ever wanted are from authors.
I am applying for publishing jobs.
My favorite color is green.

participant_2.background:
While both my parents have thick european accents , i do not.
I go to a private high school.
I drive a motorcycle instead of a car.
I am enrolled in several college credit courses.
My parents immigrated from europe before i was born.

content.text: Hi! My name is [participant_1].
Nice to meet you, [participant_2]. My name is [participant_2].
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and ride my motorcycle.
Those all sound like fun things to do. I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read all sorts of books, but I'm especially fond of historical fiction and fantasy.
Oh, me too! I love reading about other worlds and times. What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon, and I also really enjoyed the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about both of those series. I'll have to check them out.
You won't be disappointed. What are some of your favorite fantasy books?
I love the Harry Potter series by J.K. Rowling, and I also really enjoyed the Lord of the Rings series by J.R.R. Tolkien.
Those are both great series! I've read them both multiple times.
Me too! I love the world building in both of them.
Me too. They're so immersive.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to write. I'm working on a novel right now.
Oh, that's cool! What's it about?
It's about a young woman who travels to another world.
Sounds interesting! I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'm still working on it, but I'll let you know when it's ready.
Great! I look forward to it.
